entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
